website_summaries.verdict: A supportive, cool-sleeping mattress that is good for younger or smaller children and can provide medium-firm comfort through the tween years.
pros: Firm support for younger kids along with a plush top for comfort
Mattress cover resists spills and stains
Holds up to jumping and pillow fights, even on a metal-frame base
Unwraps and expands quickly with no chemical odor
cons: Minor factory flaws noted by some users

customer_reviews.title: Bugs inside mattress!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress has bedbugs inside. First night it was comfortable, not as firm as expected, but firm enough. The second night the was slight movement inside the mattress, thought it was my imagination. third night lots of off movement and what felt like tiny pin pricks on my arms, legs, feet and torso. I also had an allergic reaction - sneezing, coughing, itching and nasal congestion. Same thing every night after.
customer_reviews.author: Chamene Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but smells of chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for about two days and it really stinks. It stinks strong enough to where the smell gets stuck in your throat. I have to leave the window wide open for a few days before it goes away - I am hoping. I will update this review with my findings. Update: it’s been a week and my room smells like chemicals. There is no way it is healthy to sleep on this mattress which is a big shame as it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Adba M.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months against and its completely coming apart in the center. The center is splitting right down the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool, firm and great without box spring!
customer_reviews.text: Great firm mattress that stays cool!!! Great price and I like it better than name brands like Temperpedic. Comes with a soft cover that is waterproof! Great for platform beds with no box spring! I was going to get the 10" but this was perfect!!! The pic is my dogs bed, 2 Great Danes weighing over 300lbs total. Mattress doesn't dip or wear down. And cover can be washed easily!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these gel infused memory foam mattresses for my ikea day bed. I was looking for something comfortable due to my back injury. Tried it for the first night and it felt like I was sleeping on the floor, which is quite painful and uncomfortable. Didn’t feel like there was any memory foam on the mattresses. I was surprise at how firm these mattresses were considering how shrunk packaged they were. Was quite disappointed especially with all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Your back will die.
customer_reviews.text: Please, heed my warning, do not buy this bed. I have another mattress (different brand) I got from amazon that was pretty good so figured this one would be too, even though it was $200ish less than the other one. ITS NOT. It isn’t even comparable. Feels like I’m laying on the ground outside. My back went out within a couple weeks of sleeping on this thing. It’s terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am (not)

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Mattress! I waited to post this review to ensure I would feel the same about it months down the road and I can without a doubt say after 7 months of daily use it remains in the same plush yet supportive condition in which it arrived! As an overweight individual using this mattress nightly and seeing no signs of wear or sag is a major thing. Would definitely recommend and do plan to purchase additional for other beds in my home.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: I was very scared about ordering this but omg let me tell you this mattress came better then expected! I was co sleeping with my 2 year old and since I'm pregnant we all don't fit in the same bed anymore . I've ordered toddler beds for him and he wouldn't stay or sleep through the night . I ordered this twin mattress and my son sleeps through the whole night! I'm very impressed, happy with this mattress:)
customer_reviews.author: Maria🌻

customer_reviews.title: Comfort you can't do without
customer_reviews.text: I slept on a very uncomfortable regular mattress for several years and thought the aches and pains were because I was getting old. I originally purchased a 4" cot mattress with gel infused memory foam for my camper and it was so comfortable I replaced the mattresses on my bed with the gel infused memory foam mattress. I love it! It is so comfortable I fall asleep right away. No more aches and pains waking me up in the middle of the night. This is the best purchase I have made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: To Firm
customer_reviews.text: Its always hard ordering something like this where you get mixed reviews, some say firm, others say not firm enough. I will say from my opinion the mattress is firm. I prefer a softer mattress and this one really isn't right for me. When I lay on the mattress for a few minutes it feels pretty good, but after 10-15 minutes I start feeling like im laying on a board. I will probably end up ordering a spring/pillow top mattress and get rid of the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Craigg

customer_reviews.title: Flatter then expected
customer_reviews.text: This bed was so much flatter then we expected. Fully “inflated” it is only about 4” thick. I’m pretty disappointed in this mattress
customer_reviews.author: Jackieo1981

customer_reviews.title: Chiropractor appointment can't come soon enough...
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY IF YOU ENJOY GOOD POSTURE AND PAINLESS SLEEP This has to be one of the worst mattresses of all time. Everyone here is talking about how firm this is, "hard as a rock" But they are crazy if they think that this is any kind of firm! It's way too soft. If you use the pillowy top, YOU WILL SINK. your back will be in pain. I sleep on my back but now I've had to adjust sleeping on my side and even THAT is painful now. My neck hurts. My back hurts. I'm in constant pain, and I've booked my very first chiropractor appointment. I hate this mattress. DO NOT BUY. I AM WARNING YOU
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a memory foam mattress for my daughter to transition her into a "big girl" bed. Most of the memory foam in the stores were too thick (we purchased an IKEA Kura so eventually when we loft her it won't be a safety concern as they recommend a 5 inch mattress....we went 6 inch) so we decided on this one based on the price, details online, and other reviews. She loves it and I've slept on it too and it's great. Not too soft, not too firm! Seems like a good purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: lr

customer_reviews.title: Softest Mattress I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: The description said this was a 'firm' mattress, but it's the softest mattress I've ever had. If we ignore that, it seems like a decent mattress. If this was described as a soft mattress I'd probably be giving this 5 stars right now. But it says 'firm', which means I'll be buying another mattress from another brand when I have the money for it and that means I had a bad experience. Edit (9-27-19): Do not buy this mattress. Within 3 months it had a noticeable hole in it, and by 6 months it was completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Snyder

customer_reviews.title: my neck hurting badly from 5 days after buying this ...
customer_reviews.text: my neck hurting badly from 5 days after buying this mattress I am asking them if I can return it. 7/5/2018.
customer_reviews.author: Chandraja

customer_reviews.title: STARTED developing sunken spots after about a year....warranty difficult to use..
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was good at first..but started developing sunken spots...I am a big guy 260lbs. so I get that a little...but my wife weighs 120lbs. and she is sinking too... we tried flipping it, but it still has "sunken" spots. I am trying to reach out for warranty info...and although its splashed all over the page when they want you to buy it...it is not so easy to figure out who to contact and where. I emailed them using a link from Amazon customer service..and after typing everything out and hitting enter...I just get an error message..very frustrating. I called back Amazon and the said to call them in the morning (609-256-9000). I will update on how this goes.....
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Closeout

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for our son a year ago and now we want one!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son and now I’m back on here a year later to get it for us. This mattress is insanely comfortable. When we lay on our son’s bed we instantly start to fall asleep. As everyone else has said, it’s firm, but a comfortable firm. I never thought I would want firm, but this is the best. We have a purple mattress and we both (my husband and I) want this instead — and that was $1000! As far as holding up, I’m not too sure as my son only weighs about 30#, but it still seems like new after almost a year, so either way, totally worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: kperkins

customer_reviews.title: May cause breathing issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product. My son now has asthma an can not sleep at night because he is allergic to this matress. He has an asthma pump and can know longer sleep on this matress. I brought it in June and my son never had any allergy problems. He has been going back and forth to the doctors about this issue and it never got better. Even with his pump he still cannot breath. He stayed the night out and realize that it did happen at his relative’s house. I am writing so this will not happen to other customers. I let him sleep in another room and it did not happen.
customer_reviews.author: sistatrea

customer_reviews.title: This bed makes me sleep on my sofa.
customer_reviews.text: Do you like to sleep? Do you like to wake up well rested? If you said yes then this is not the mattress for you! I’ve never woke up with so much back pain nor had as many restless nights as I’ve had since purchasing this mattresses. Please do yourself a favor and sleep on the floor before purchasing this mattress. If I could give negative stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! My husband has degenerative disc disease and he rarely gets a good night's sleep. Since using this mattress, he has had better sleep! We both experience less tossing and turning and our quality of sleep has significantly improved. I was hesitant to try it, and thought no mattress under $300 would really be worth the money. I was wrong! No problems unpacking it or getting adjusted to it. Very simple and easy to open. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Greenie

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure about the quality
customer_reviews.text: We only had the foam mattress for a couple of months and already we have made indents where our bodies lies during the night. We love it however we are waiting to see if the quality is good as we are already seeing such an indentation in the mattress. Also the smell was difficult. we had to air the mattress for a long time before that smell could go away.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these on Prime day for my twin daughters for big girl beds at a great price. They “inflated” nicely and seem comfortable so far with no noticeable odor. The girls are only 4 years old, so I don’t foresee any problems with them holding up. We also have a waterproof cover to protect the mattresses in case of an accident. I’ve slept for short periods of time on them when the girls have trouble sleeping and i’ve been perfectly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: syrcatgrl

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Reasonable Bunch
customer_reviews.text: Of the foam mattresses that are reasonably priced, we have tried three for our cabin (which needed four, single mattresses). The other two were well-rated and okay, but this is the one that moved us to buy a second of the same brand. We got rid of our heavy. standard, springs-and-stuffing mattresses, and these are much more comfortable (and better than the other two, mid-priced, foam mattresses, which were still pretty good). Good response, no bottoming out or feeling engulfed. There are more expensive foam mattresses out there, but they're not rated any better than this, and there's really no reason (in my mind) to believe they would be superior. And this had a 10-year warranty card in it.
customer_reviews.author: FreeAtLast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable- firm and supportive but also has a little softness to sink into comfortably. It doesn’t get hot while sleeping on it and is true to size so sheets fit well. The cover can be removed for washing, it inflated quickly after unwrapping, has no smell, and is lightheaded enough that it can easily be moved if necessary. Ours gets used on a bunk bed and is easy to lift over your head by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyEverythingonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress about 1.5 years ago for our daughter and it rose perfectly. About a month ago we purchased the same mattress for our second daughter expecting the same quality. Unfortunately, after following the exact same instructions, our corners have barely risen to 4 inches. The mattress is still comfortable and it does the job. But we are disappointed that the corners did not rise properly. The height difference from the corners to the middle of the mattress are so extreme that they are very visible, even with sheets on.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Modway Aveline 6" Gel Infused Memory Foam Twin Mattress
customer_reviews.text: To start with delivery to our front door no hassles shopping around wasting time, they arrived timely and all packaging intact, great price w/10 warranty, overall extremely positive experience. We ordered two twin size for bunk beds. Followed the instructions removed from the box and plastic bag then rolled them out on the bed frame (bunk box) within several minutes they inflated to full size and we had little to no odor of any kind. They look great, feel great and are as comfortable as a memory foam mattresses that sell for 5X the price. They work perfectly in the kids' room (PS; they love them too).
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Best sleep in years and you cant beat the price. Bought 2 twins for the kids, and I fell asleep on it while readig them books. Turned around and bought a king, now it is twice as amazing for me. no pressure points, no acheiness, just like sleeping on a cloud. Amd the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: jwal

customer_reviews.title: It's a firm mattress but great value
customer_reviews.text: If the carpet floor was 10 firmness on a scale of 1-10, I would give this a 7 firm. I've had 9-8 firm spring mattresses before. Our current other much more expensive memory foam mattress is a firmness of 6-5 (medium). For the price it's excellent. The firmness is a big harder then what I would like, but it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GenZen

customer_reviews.title: Health! Glass fibers!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has glass fibers beware.....on their tag it says 50% glass fibers and 50% modacrylic fibers
customer_reviews.author: Lame tools

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for our purposes! We needed a shorter mattress for our camper van, and this did the trick. It's very comfortable in my opinion. It had a faint chemical scent when we pulled it out but that dissipated pretty quickly. It reached full size within a day or two and was ready to go. We read about fiberglass being an issue with some of these types of mattresses (when you remove the cover) so we bought an extra waterproof cover for it since you aren't supposed to remove the cover that comes provided with it. I"ll edit my review if we have any issues with it in the future but as of currently it's doing great.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock. Memory foam is a marketing gimmick
customer_reviews.text: I don’t feel the memory foam at all. The mattress immediately comes back to normal form. Sleeping on it, it’s hard. Like real hard. Waking up, my back hurt, it was really uncomfortable. I would return this mattress back but our guests are already here and since mattresses inflate, putting them in a box is impossible and it costs more to ship it back. If you want a nice and comfortable mattress. This ain’t one.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Right of the bat, it seemed too firm for me at first but when I actually went to bed, I realized how comfy it was! It's just right! I'm around 200 lbs for your reference so all the right places sunk in but still had great support and my spine remained straight even laying on my side. Now, my 10 yo daughter is very skinny so it's a bit too firm for her, you need some body mass to be comfy on this mattress. Hope this was helpful to someone :)
customer_reviews.author: lgt73

customer_reviews.title: First night - fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it - July 2017. It fully inflated very quickly, like in 10 minutes. Let it sit open for several hours before making it up and was slept on that night. We bought a twin for grandkids in a guest room and all the adults thought it looked very comfortable. Will have adult guests shortly and will see how they like it. It was very comfortable to lay down with my toddler grandson as he dozed off. Appears to be a great product, at a spectacular price. I will update if we run into any issues in the future. But as a new product I am extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have been sleeping on this mattress for a few months now. We are average sized people. Considering the price, this is a very good mattress. Great edge support. Not too firm but not too soft. My lower back pain went away after switching to this mattress. It was so easy to set up. Just open the box, unroll, and let it inflate. We let it sit for a full 24 hours before sleeping on it. No weird smells after it inflated. It has not started sagging nor has there been any notable change in the shape over the past few months. Overall, I would recommend this mattress to folks looking for a simple mattress.
customer_reviews.author: RocknRunner

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress money can buy read my review
customer_reviews.text: I own a hotel where I get half price off of any Serta mattress and I chose this mattress for my own home because it is by far the most comfortable mattress I have ever slept in in the price cannot be beat do not be fooled by name brands as I stated I own multiple hotels this is where it's at
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Not hard Not soft just right
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. I bought a twin mattress and it’s held up over a year. I decided to buy a full size mattress for my daughters room for when she comes home from college. I found myself laying in her bed, because it’s comfortable. I need to buy a king size next. ( for my bed) It takes the pressure off all your pain. Some reviews say it has a chemical smell ... the twin bed or the full did not have a smell. Bedbugs... I didn’t get any bedbugs with the two mattresses that I purchased from Amazon. Hope you buy this mattress and enjoy it as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTee

customer_reviews.title: mattress
customer_reviews.text: this ended up being the second mattress I bought within a week, first a zinus and then this one, this mattress is not very comfortable at all, it feels like the center is high and it want to roll you out of the bed all night long regardless of which side you sleep on, the zinus I bought a few days before this one was a very good mattress but I made the mistake of ordering one to big for my camper and gave it away, so next week I swill be ordering another mattress to replace this one with. I would not buy one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Gone

customer_reviews.title: This is surprisingly super comfortable! I bought this for our guest room ...
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly super comfortable! I bought this for our guest room and everyone that has ever slept in there has LOVED it! It came rolled up in a box. It took about a bay for it to completely expend and air out. There was a slight odor, but it wasn't too overwhelming and was gone within a day or so after being out of the plastic. My only complaint is that the end that was in the very middle of the rolled up mattress never quite expanded or fluffed completely. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fully inflate to 10", Extra firm and Sleeps Hot
customer_reviews.text: Found this mattress to be too hard and very hot. I am a stomach sleeper and usually very cold but this actually made me too hot even in cold winter temps. Also, it did not fully inflate to 10", even after letting it expand for 3 days and after using it for a month and half. The quality control is not good considering I slept on the exact same type of mattress before and did not have these problems. Sounds like from other reviews either you luck out with a good one or you get screwed. Not worth it, I liked my Sleep Science memory foam mattress from Costco much better.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Really fantastic mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic mattress for the price. twin size for my son's bed. granted he is 3 years old and might just love his bed for the sheets and plush toys but he does say he loves his bed. :-) . Mattress seems very comfortable judging from a single nap . Perfect size for Twin bed-frame ( from Ikea). It looks like it will hold up real well but time will tell. Very happy with my purchase, seems you get more than what you paid for ( way cheeper than Ikea mattress yet much much better)
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It is very close to 6 inches maybe a half to a quarter inch short of 6 inches but nothing is perfect. I should of ordered the 8 inch one instead as I am using it for a trundle and I was afraid the 8" one might be too big but now know it would of worked out ok. Great mattress, it is perfect to use for those short one or two day stays for a young guest. If you want one to use as a full time mattress I would suggest the 8" one if you can afford the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: I’m a college student who just moved off campus. I was introduced to memory foam my transfer year and fell in love with its softness and just sinking into a nice sleep. When I moved off campus I wanted to duplicate that but this bed is much firmer and the foam is much thinner. I also paid more for this that the college price. I’m not really satisfied would have gave it a 2 1/2 I’ll proably end up buying an additional foam to place on top.
customer_reviews.author: Festus Oziegbe

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I got a 4" double at Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I got a 4" double at Christmas to accommodate additional guests. after Christmas I moved it onto my king size bed and it was OK.. but at 4" the sag of the underlying mattress was still an issue. For this 6" I replaced the entire mattress and put this on the box springs. I've only slept on it one night so the 4 stars might get upgraded once I get some history on it. This sleeps like a "firm" with the subtle but important difference that it also conforms to your body lumps... like hips. Ask for an update after 90 days and I'll tell whether it develops any low spots.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Harrocks

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter. I wasn't expecting it to be as comfortable as it is. While everyone's comfort is subjective, my daughters and I felt this mattress to have the right amount of firmness and comfort. My daughter said it is firm but when you lay on it, it molds just enough to your body for comfort and I agree. I actually took a short nap on it and had a nice rest. When I opened the box, it only had a slight smell. I left it alone in the room for a couple of days, and no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: m7

customer_reviews.title: BEDBUGS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself isn’t bad but from the day we received the mattress, my daughter has been bitten by bedbugs numerous times. We haven’t traveled or left the house for any period of time. I’m a stay-at-home mom and she doesn’t even go to school. There are so many bites we can’t even count them and they’re scarring badly. Of the 4 kids and 2 adults, the one with the new mattress is the only one getting bitten. So it must be from the mattress. We’ve never had bedbug issues ever. I should have bought the mattress from a reputable mattress company locally.
customer_reviews.author: Reina Shelby

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I use this mattress in my camper van and recently spent four nights on it. It sits on a steel-framed platform on a plywood base. No box-spring or extra foam padding. My mattress is on the stiff end of the spectrum which I like. It stays fairly cool. Just soft enough. Just supportive enough. The mattress was delivered vac-sealed in a plastic bag, rolled and in a white cardboard box. I stored it this way for 2 months before I installed it. It took about 24hrs to fully come to size after unbagging. I am super-happy about my purchase. If this thing lasts a few years I'll definitely buy online again.
customer_reviews.author: Doc1

customer_reviews.title: So good that Im buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress for our guest bed but it is so comfortable that we end up sleeping on it most nights! Especially when we need a really good nights sleep or we have a sore back or hips, this mattress is perfect. For reference, we are two mid thirties parents. One of us is a back-sleeper, and the other is a side-sleeper. We are now buying another one to replace our $1200+ mattress with foam topper, because we love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Hallfam

customer_reviews.title: We are so glad we picked this brand
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of the twin Modway Aveline 6 inch mattresses. We are so glad we picked this brand. Removing the mattresses from the boxes was super easy. We just laid them right onto our daughters twin beds/bunky boards and opened them up. The raised right up to the full 6 inches within an hour. We were pretty shocked because of some of the negative reviews. There was a slight odor but we just put their bedroom fan on high for a couple hours and there was no more smell after. We have zero complaints! Definitely thinking about buying a king size for our bed!
customer_reviews.author: PARIS DARGAVEL-BALL

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress at phenomenal price
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Flattened and rolled into a small box. Remove outer plastic. Unroll. Carefully cut plastic bag. Mattress expands. Let sit for a day (they recommend 2 days). I did a bit over 1day. Was indeed 8 inches with 2 inch gel infused foam layer. No odor. Firm cool. Has outer fabric cover with zipper. Very satisfied after 4 days sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Brahe

customer_reviews.title: who took a nap on one) said they slept great. We got quick delivery of two nice mattresses ...
customer_reviews.text: My in-laws were visiting - we needed two twin mattresses, quickly! We got them - and, so much more, when we bought a pair of the Modway twin. I haven't slept on one, but in-laws (and our son, who took a nap on one) said they slept great. We got quick delivery of two nice mattresses for a great price, and now, are feeling relieved we can offer our guest room without having to worry about mattress condition and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Ligon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted over a year thus far
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has ehlers-danlos and Chiari Malformation which gives her great pain. So she needed something with softness yet firm for her back. It has been great for her thus far. She is a stomach sleeper primarily, sometimes back. We put it on top of a regular box spring and it seems to work well. No slumping at all. We keep it covered and protected with a water repellent mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Miss ReadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The quality far exceeds the modest price
customer_reviews.text: The mattress inflated quickly and we were able to sleep on it the 1st night. There was only the faintest chemical odor and that dissipated within a day. As promised the mattress is soft enough to be comfortable but not so soft it is mushy. We have been sleeping on it for about 3 months and have noticed no sagging or permanent dents. My wife and I are both on the heavier side and if it was going to start sagging it would have by now. All in all, the quality far exceeds the modest price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but  not "cooling"
customer_reviews.text: I went from sleeping on a spring mattress with a 3" memory foam topper, to this mattress. It's not bad, a little firmer than I would like, but I've gotten used to it. The listing says it's a "cooling" mattress, but that is definitely not the case, it runs hot, at least compared to the spring and memory foam I was used to. It retains its shape well, hasn't developed a trough where my body usually sits, after 6 months of use, so that's good. I'd recommend it, as long as you aren't looking for a cooling mattress.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've ever slept on.
customer_reviews.text: Matress arrived in a 18 inch square box. I set it on my solid plywood base, took the rolled up mattress out of the box, and u rolled it. Then I carefully slit open the plastic bag. Wow what a sight to see. In seconds this squashed flat object grew into full 8 inch thick mattress. Maybe a few minutes to achieve 100%. Anyhow this is the most comfortable mattress I ever slept on. It conforms to my body no matter what possition I'm in. It's firm for my bad back but soft enough to even rest my head on my arm without waking up later with a dead arm. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Medium softness
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people said this was very soft and plush. It's fairly firm to me. I've been sleeping on a fancy $1000 14-inch super soft pillowtop mattress for the past 18 years (which, unfortunately, is falling apart), so maybe I'm a bit spoiled. I will definitely have to add a down mattress topper or something. Adding a mattress topper will make it too tall though, so now I'm debating whether I should return it and get something else, or get the 6" version.
customer_reviews.author: Lars SveenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It has fiberglass - I DON’T CARE
customer_reviews.text: I researched the crap out of these mattresses. They all have fiberglass - it’s to meet fire code. Don’t take off the cover!!! The zipper is to make it easy for them to manufacture it, not for you to clean it. Just don’t open it. Put a mattress protector over it to protect it - you should do this with any mattress. It should be waterproof if you have kids, or if you’re unfortunate enough to live with child-like adults who may be prone to excess drinking and/or the occasional nocturnal emptying of the bladder. (Better you than me.)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for our 4 y/o daughter and we are very happy with it. Unboxing and set up was easy. The mattress took full shape within 24 hours. We did not notice any smell to it and it’s seems well made. It has been in use for about 2 months now and we have zero complaints about it. I was a little worried because it’s on a loft bed but there are no issues with sagging or weak spots with having the slats for a base.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: MOLDY less than a year later
customer_reviews.text: I unrolled the mattress then immediately encased it in an allergen/moistureproof zip up mattress procector. Almost 9 months later after regular sheet changes, I took it off the whole cover to wash and there is a huge mold spot on the bottom of the mattress towards the middle, i had to throw it away! A huge waste of resources and money. Zero stars, 0/10 recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Donna's

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical...
customer_reviews.text: about buying a mattress in a box online, but decided to take the plunge after reading all of the positive reviews. I decided that my teenage daughter, who is petite and weighs 110 pounds, needed a new mattress after she complained of an achy back. It was fun to unbox the mattress and watch it "grow." It was thicker than we expected, and fit her sheets perfectly. The main advantage though, is that her back pain disappeared after a few nights. She says that it is super comfortable and that she falls asleep quickly now. We are super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fall apart after 2 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Waited 2 years to write a review. We purchased it in July 2018, hoping it will last for 6 or so months until we can afford to buy a real good mattress. But we never needed one! This mattress didn’t change it’s shape, didn’t fall apart and it’s so comfortable, it feels like we paid over a thousand dollars. I recently was able to remove the cover and wash it, and it didn’t fall apart, didn’t shrink, was easy to put back on the foam. Very impressed and very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Samusik

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my daughter and of course when you first see the product, it is rolled up like a skinny burrito. :) When I put this on her slat bed and opened it up it expanded really quickly to the full 10 inches. We didn't lay on it for 48 hours just to make sure expansion was all done...but when we did, it was so comfortable and soft and supportive. My daughter says she sleeps soundly through the night unlike her other mattress. She loves this mattress and I do as well. I am thinking about purchasing a queen size for myself. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You do want to wait a few days after airing this mattress out before you sleep on it. Measured exactly 8" as promised, very comfortable to sleep on and I do not feel hot when sleeping on the mattress. So far so good, I was a bit worried that this would be too firm or that I would simply sink into the mattress. 5'7 203 lbs No more neck aches and shoulder pain from my old spring mattress. After some time has passed there is a slight chemical smell in the mattress however not enough to bother me one bit. I am still very happy with the mattress its holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: bkipplen

customer_reviews.title: Firmness 6 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Some may like it. My boyfriend thought it felt firm. I liked the firm foam feel at first (it reminded me of my other memory foam mattress ). I would rate firmness at 6 out of 10 ...but it didn't work for me.. after a month or 2...I was waking up sore. I tried flipping it over but that layer was too firm by itself, I tried a soft 3" memory foam topper with it flipped but that didn't seem any better. I think I need a more supportive mattress, my old one was 7 out of 10. At almost 3 months I returned this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl81

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a thin mattresses from IKEA that is not nearly this comfortable, is much heavier and was almost twice the price. This mattress is very lightweight (sometimes the gel/memory foam are SUPER heavy..my husband and I have a Tempurpedic and it's a beast), so it's easy to lift up to make my sons daybed. It is very comfortable to sleep on as well. Mine "inflated" in under 20 min and there was no smell at all. I'm super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hildy

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: this mattress is dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Warning! This mattress is dangerous! Your kids will not want to wake up. They will start requesting naps mid-day. They will argue over whether another sibling can sleep in their room on the bottom bunk... they will start to make you late every morning due to inability to leave the bed! In all seriousness: My kids kids love this mattress. I bought this for a bunk bad and they said on a scale of 0-10 of worst sleep to best sleep ever, they picked a 1000. My kids love their new mattresses. Would definitely recommend and buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Have or get a platform base - this mattress is only comfortable if placed on a platform bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress, we both have back problems and this mattress is firm but comfortable, not like a stiff board but firm, not sagging in but not being uncomfortable either, slept good on it only after we received the Zinus 14 Inch Classic Metal Platform Bed Frame with Steel Slat Support, Mattress Foundation, Queen which makes this mattress perfect in comfort. when we received we placed it on our old bed frame and it was not comfortable until we received the platform base. so get the platform base along with it if you don't have a platform bed. The mattress arrived packed tightly in a box, and expended in a few hours ready to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mattress to date
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We let it fully decompress before sleeping on it. Was having minor back trouble which has gone away since sleeping a couple nights on this mattress. Overall firm yet supportive. Feels firm enough for co-sleeping with my 15 month old, better than my last mattress in fact, yet very supportive. This is a heavy mattress, which I presumed indicated the density of the foam to some extent. It seems like good quality and was ready to get used to even after sleeping on an inner spring for the last ten years. Favorite mattress I've had, including another cheaper foam mattress that was lighter and simply inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Boning

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Rolled out and plumped up just fine! But I am so sorry that i purchased this. Tried it for one year, tried to make it work, but gonna throw it away. Just uncomfortable, rigid, hot, no give for when you want to bounce around like trying to get momentum to flip over. So bad. Sorry for bad review.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reading on a lot of different brands like this. This one stood out to me on reviews alone, especially with a 10 year warranty. When you unroll it to put on bed have another person with you. It immediately fluffs up to the full size very quickly. There is a foam smell that leaves quickly if you ventilate the room. It’s a firm mattress that conforms to your body in just the right spots. When you sit on the side of the bed you don’t slide off, which I’ve read that other mattresses do. So far I’m not disappointed at all. Normally I wake up hurting and I didn’t after one night on this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K Freeman

customer_reviews.title: poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: who said mattresses last 7 years? this one was only a little over a year on me and I'm tossing it tonight! I've been consistently waking up sore in the back and neck and found out this was the culprit. it has become too soft, have begun to sag, causing me to wake up in pain and not feeling refreshed most days. I noticed uneven density in the center, tried rotating and flipped it several times but that only lasted few weeks. plus BUGS! So poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Squishy comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mattress!! I am a larger woman, and a side sleeper most of the time. Thos mattress accomodates me exceptionally well. My favorite part of going to bed is laying down for the first time at night. I can feel the foam sinking in around me. It is wonderful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Suejaba53

customer_reviews.title: 6 Months use and son likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for use on an elevated platform , bed. After more than 6 months usage, he has had no complaints at all. The mattress unrolled as it should and fairly quickly expanded to normal dimensions. We waited 24hrs to use it. There was no unusual odors as others have said. Standard twin sheets fit it great. While I know we would not be able to compress it again, I feel it could be rolled up and moved fairly easily. We would consider buying another should we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo123

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not cloud soft ;-)
customer_reviews.text: Great bed even at 8 inches. I was looking for a VERY soft bed but this bed falls in the middle of the spectrum. I'm very happy with it though would like just an extra inch of gel foam. I considered the 10 inch but found this size bed to more versatile as it fits futon frames as well. If you don't plan on re-purposing it in the future go for the 10 inch. It would be the right comfort balance and best choice at this quality/safety and cost ~$180. You found the best bed. Now just choose the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Memory Foam Loses It's Memory
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mattress for the past year. At the very beginning it felt a bit too stiff and firm for my liking. But then as I used it every night I noticed the stiffness goes down eventually and becomes a bit comfortable. Only till I kept using it and now I notice what really happened. The mattress is slowly losing its shape. With that the surface is getting losing its ability to hold weight on top of it. Lately sleep has been really uncomfortable and painful. I would recommend you to go for a Zinus or some other brand vs this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Anish

customer_reviews.title: since it's pretty easy to move around and was fun for movies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for visiting guest and now stash it under my queen bed when not in use. For about a month I had it in the living room, since it's pretty easy to move around and was fun for movies, but as I'm trying to be an adult I've since put it away. I will say that in that time I fell asleep on it, and it rivaled the name brand memory foam mattress I got from costco for myself, and was possibly better. Nice mattress, not just for kids. Appreciate that it's comfortable without being too thick to function as my pseudo trundle.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for the Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is worth every penny! I did some research online before I bought this mattress because I needed a mattress for back sleepers. It was the 2nd highest rated mattress out of the top 10 listed with an 8.6/10, and listed as the best mattress for those on a budget. It came in a long tube-rectangle box vacuum-sealed. It was very easy to unwrap and lay out. It took a few hours to completely expand and had a bit of a smell, but that dissipated in a day or so. This is seriously THE most comfortable mattress I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible / Only For Children
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why everyone says this is a firm bed and it’s amazing. I literally sink in this mattress even if I’m sitting on it. I’m in my 20’s and have never had back pain before until this bed. I’ve had it for a while, since 2017 so I’m giving a real review. I would only recommend for children because they are now that heavy. Anyone who’s over 110 pounds is going to sink for sure. I have to put a pillow under the mattress for support right now that’s how bad it is until I buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Firm, great bed.
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed because my husband has very bad back pain from a car accident where he broke his back. We needed a firm bed and this one is great. It is very firm, our bodies did wake up a little sore for the first week or so because our bodies weren't use to it. Our Now we wake up fine with no pain. Some reviews say there is a smell, yes, but as long as you keep your window open/ cracked for the first week or two, it goes away. The bed has kept its shape, can't feel the other person move, and it's comfortable! I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lilli

customer_reviews.title: it definitely holds its shape well while being comfortable. I purchased one of those 18" high metal ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress (10 inch) for about 3-ish months, going on 4 soon. It is fairly firm - not uncomfortable, but at least from my experience, it definitely holds its shape well while being comfortable. I purchased one of those 18" high metal platform foundations and for the price it has felt like a worthwhile investment. Kind of wish I would've gone with a wider bed than a Twin, but for someone of average build/height this mattress has been a dream to sleep on. Definitely recommend, especially those needing a replacement on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Hima

customer_reviews.title: My little girl loves it ! Even a year later
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter loves this mattress . We live off from civilization so not many mattress stores nearby. For a lightweight thin 12 year old girl she loves this mattress a year later. It lays on plywood ( homemade bunk beds) without any box springs and sure beats the cheap old spring mattress she had. She says she likes it because it forms to her each night and is so comfy. I asked her then is it to soft or doesn’t give support ? Her reply was it definitely supports her but in a comfy desirable way. Well there ya go - we know little girls love it !
customer_reviews.author: donkey-boy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if you're a back sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Definitely on the firm side. Not bad if you're a back sleeper, but I'm not. Never slept more than an hour due to discomfort, by the morning my hips felt like I'd aged 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: We love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We looked at a lot of mattresses and a lot of reviews before buying. We ultimately chose this one and are glad we did. It took at least 24 hours to fully expand. I didn't find the smell bad at all (maybe a slight smell but definitely nothing overpowering). My daughter loves it! Says it's the best night's sleep she's ever had. And I would have to agree with her. I haven't slept on it but have layed on it several times and it is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is FIRM
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of this mattress. However, it wasn't until after I bought it that I realized that's it's too hard for me. When people say it's firm, it's really FIRM. I knew that I wanted a soft memory foam mattress, so I thought this would achieve my goal, but I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Drive

customer_reviews.title: If you need a firm mattress, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.text: In description from Amazon, this mattress was listed as medium. I did not want a firm mattress being I can’t sleep on anything firm due to nerve damage. That’s exactly what I got, a super firm mattress. I want to return for a refund, but with a mattress in a box I don’t think that’s an option. If you want a firm mattress, this is the mattress for you.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but more firm than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! Packaging was light and easy to carry, mattress puffed up to full size in about 36 hours. Super comfortable, have been getting great sleep. Only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is that I was expecting a softer mattress - I really don't feel like I sink into this mattress at all, maybe half an inch at most. My previous memory foam mattresses have definitely been softer.
customer_reviews.author: aromatherapy

customer_reviews.title: FIBERGLASS INNER LAYER
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this mattress, they use a antifire later that’s made out of fiberglass. This was banned because it causes major health problems and also sever skin irritations such as feeling like your laying on pins and needles and constant itching, the fiberglass layer on my mattress ripped and my entire house has this crap every where and we had to pay for a specialist to come clean all of the rooms to remove the fibers. DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Liam Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased... No problems.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress arrived one week after I placed the order...I tracked it to make sure I did not miss delivery..then I recived a notice on the door from Fed EX...saying it was down stairs....!!! I was shocked..I live on the third floor and I am 57 with a disability..so I had to call my husband to come home from work to bring it up stairs...they had left it in the public walk way.. They did not even knock the door to tell me..I was in so much shock that FED EX would do this. I have no issues with the mattress..its lovely...!!! and NO smell and No time to inflate with air. BUT the delivery company was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a rock
customer_reviews.text: I took a leap of faith and purchased this bed during Prime Day. Pretty good deal, but the bed is SO FIRM. Majorly firm. This is coming from a person that enjoys sleeping on the floor because it is so firm (good for my back). I feel kind of bad for letting my little one sleep on it and I suspect when she gets older, she will ask for something different. Generally, the bed otherwise is great. It didn't have a smell, and it puffed up quickly from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a great price on Black Friday for my spare bedroom. My sister has been staying with me for 6 months, and when she returned home she said she missed sleeping on this bed! So comfortable. And it comes with the frame, easy to put together. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jtd

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on high-end expensive mattresses!
customer_reviews.text: Having delivered mattresses and furniture for 18 years and having every mattress known to man this thing is amazing. amazing back pain relief great comfort and you never feel your partner move
customer_reviews.author: David Barrow

customer_reviews.title: No more orthopedic pain.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and clean. Followed instructions to wait until fully inflated. With our first nights sleep, we awoke without any orthopedic pain to our shoulders or hips. For a 70 year old individual, that was greatly appreciated. We are completely satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: jrcrwfrd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our son's room. He loves it and has been sleeping better since we upgraded to this. My husband, who has back problems, has tried it a few times. He sleeps well on it, but still has some back pain. (He is never without pain, so it's nothing against the mattress, it's just not a miracle cure depending on what type of pain or injury you have.) It is a very comfortable mattress. The smell dissipates after unpacking. I highly suggest a waterproof mattress protector to help combat smells getting into the mattress though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly12

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend !
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more stars if possible. It is SO comfortable and doesn't sleep hot. Husband and I weigh over 500 lbs combined, and it sleeps us and 2 kids (some nights) just fine! We prefer different bed types but this works fantastic for both of us. It's like sleeping in a hug all night! We both suffer from back pain when a bad matteess is involved and our only complaint with this is that we don't have enough hours in the night to use it! Our son loves it so much he has asked if we will get him his own, too. We plan on updating all the mattresses to this in time.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use on his bunk bed. I couldn’t believe how it came in a rectangular book and within a couple of hours was ready to use. It is easily one of the most comfortable mattresses I have ever lay on and my 5 year old LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Hamish

customer_reviews.title: Great for our boys
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these, the packaging was pretty amazing, vacuum sealed. While letting them expand there is very minimal smell compared to some of the mattresses I have had in the past. The 6" will work great for our boys as I will make bunk beds for these, however for someone larger the 8" or more would probably be warranted. Look forward to seeing how these hold up over time!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin & Allison Palet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress based on the positive reviews. I use it in a second bedroom for AirBNB guests. Everyone comments on how comfortable it is and a few guests have even asked me for the brand name and model. Sometimes I catch a nap on it in between guest stays. It's not too firm and not too soft. I'm impressed by the quality and price ompared to much more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mattress and inexpensive! Very comfortable. Sometimes I find myself waking up in the morning without moving from my original position that I fell asleep. My husband is in construction and is always sore and can’t sleep. He loves this mattress. He says it helps all his aches and pains. Will definitely get another one when/if it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful in every way
customer_reviews.text: WE had another similar mattress but the odor didn't go away after 3 weeks. We returned it. Amazon return policy was great. We had used that mattress on vacation so we knew it was good... so we bought this one. It is absolutely awesome. It is about 3 inches wider than our reg. queen size bed, but our sheets fit. It had no smell. We have had it about 2 years and it is still like new. I highly recommend it. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8" is What I Ordered... 8" is what I received
customer_reviews.text: The bed fully compressed for me within 24 hrs. It measured just under 8", which I will not complain about. It would have been a perfect 5-star rating had it not been for the corners not expanding fully. That is a very minor complaint as the bulk of the bed expanded adequately. The bed is for my 5-year old, but I slept on it the first night. The sleep quality was excellent, with no pain the following morning. It is truly a comfortable bed. There was a slight odor that was expected, and it dissipated within two days. It is a great bed at an exceptional price. I will update the review in six months.
customer_reviews.author: Vallos

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived well packed and on time. The gel part of the mattress is very soft and feels great. However, the mattress is very firm. It feels like 3 inches of memory foam on plywood. My granddaughter tried to sleep on it one night and ended up sleeping on the couch. She has slept on the couch ever since. If you like a firm bed then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyb

product_meta.title: Modway Aveline 6" Gel Infused Memory Foam Twin Mattress With CertiPUR-US Certified Foam
product_meta.description: Size:Twin| Style:6 inchTake a deep breath and exhale because you've found your pathway to that perfect sleep with the Aveline 6 inch pressure relief twin memory foam mattress. Topped with gel-infused memory foam to keep your body climate steady, this firm twin mattress dissipates your body heat while quickly conforming to your weight and position. Sleep peacefully with an open cell ventilated memory foam solution that relieves pressure points, reduces bounce between two sleepers, and delivers welcome relief from the aches and pains of traditional twin mattresses. Aveline cooling gel twin mattress is CertiPUR-US certified by accredited independent testing laboratories, so you can be confident that the memory foam is made without formaldehyde, ozone depleters, mercury, and other heavy metals including PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP (”Tris”) flame retardants, and is low on VOC. This 6 inch twin memory foam mattress comes vacuum-packed and rolled to fit into an easily portable box. It takes 2 to 4 hours for the twin gel mattress from your bed in a box to expand most of the way and a day to expand fully. Includes a removable stretch knit diamond patterned cover. Box spring or foundation is optional. Slatted bases should be less than 3" apart.
feature_bullets: BEST REVIEWED MATTRESS - Purchase the top rated twin mattress at the lowest price. Aveline delivers high quality memory foam comfort and support at a price you can afford.
SLEEP SOUNDLY - Reduce pressure on your head, neck and spine with an open cell memory foam twin mattress. Aveline helps align your spine and reduce pressure on your hips, lower back and shoulders.
INDEPENDENTLY TESTED - The foam inside is CertiPUR-US certified so you can be sure it’s made without formaldehyde, heavy metals, PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP (”Tris”) flame retardants, and is low on VOC.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION - Over 98% of Aveline customers are satisfied with their purchase and buy more as the need arises. Back that up with our 10-year warranty, and you can rest easy knowing you are purchasing a quality mattress at an exceptional price.
COOLING MATTRESS - Aveline comes with gel-infused memory foam top layer that is open cell and ventilated. Sleep comfortably while reducing sweat and perspiration during hot or humid weather.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,922 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
